name: UN's Table (Ekoxe, wesslo)
description:
UN’s Table is an action-packed turn-based game where you can play as your favourite nations, and duke it out in the Headquarters of the United Nations.

Pick and choose between 4 different nations, each with their own unique voice acting and national beer.

Play local multiplayer and decide arguments with your friends.

Or challenge the advanced AI in a solitaire game.

Made in 72hours for the Ludum Dare 49

Created by Wessl/Dez & Ekoxe
